function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting an online survey due to the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Limited access for certain demographics, potential response bias","Mitigation":"Provide alternative survey methods, ensure diverse outreach, and address potential biases in analysis","Technologies":"Online survey platforms with accessibility features","People":"Residents of Krak\\u00f3w","Owner":"Researchers and survey administrators"},{"Description":"Use of online surveys for data collection","Impact":"Exclusion of populations with limited internet access, potential bias in responses","Mitigation":"Use multiple data collection methods, provide assistance to those with limited internet access, and consider the potential biases in data analysis","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, traditional paper-and-pencil surveys","People":"Residents of Krak\\u00f3w","Owner":"Research team and survey administrators"}]}
